Note:  A primary activity refers to an individual's main activity. The activity code for Grocery shopping is 070101; and the codes for Food preparation and cleanup are 020201, 020202, 020203, and 020299. Primary eating & drinking includes Eating and drinking (110101) and Eating and drinking as part of job (050202). Paid work includes all 05xxxx activities except activity 050202; Travel includes all 18xxxx activities; and Sleeping includes activities 010101, 010102, and 010199.
Source: USDA, Economic Research Service, using data from the Bureau of Labor Statistics’ 2016 American Time Use Survey (ATUS) and Eating and Health Module.
